title: Club invite issues
body: Hey, I was invited to a club a few days back. I got a push notification on my phone saying I was invited, but it doesn't show on my client anywhere. How long does it take for invites to get to us, or should I ask the club leader to resend it?

replies.body: They should come through almost immediately so I'd probably try asking him again. If you already accepted but it's not showing, let me know what the club name is and I can poke around for ya.
